events.message: We have received the application for the Senior Software Engineer position from the candidate and will begin the review process shortly.
After reviewing the application materials, we have categorised this candidate under the Engineering cluster for further consideration.
A recruiter specialized in engineering roles has been assigned to manage this candidate's recruitment process from this point forward.
The candidate completed the initial screening interview, demonstrating strong knowledge in software development and problem-solving skills.
We received the candidate's positive response confirming their continued interest and availability for the next interview stages.
The technical interview has been scheduled for the candidate with our lead developer to evaluate their coding and system design skills.
The candidate successfully completed the technical interview, impressing the panel with their problem-solving approach and engineering expertise.
An HR interview has been scheduled to discuss company culture fit, benefits, and other employment terms with the candidate.
The HR interview was completed successfully, with mutual agreement on workplace expectations and candidate enthusiasm.
A formal offer for the Software Engineer position has been sent to the candidate detailing salary, benefits, and start date.
